item.title: CVE-2021-20828|2024-08-03T17:53:22.655Z -- activefusions%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- order%20status%20batch%20change%20plug-in%20%28for%20ec-cube%203.0%20series%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Order Status Batch Change Plug-in (for EC-CUBE 3.0 series) all versions allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
